ideal_precis.title: Insignificant Drop Becomes Priceless Pearl
ideal_precis.text: A drop of water, falling into the sea, lamented its insignificance amid the vast ocean, deeming itself worthless. Swallowed by a nearby oyster mid-soliloquy, it hardened gradually into a pearl. After numerous adventures, it reached a diver's hands and now adorns the Persian crown.
